traceability.evidence: • CLI parsing (src/cli-options.js) recognizes --update and --yes flags • Help text (bin/dry-aged-deps.js) documents --update and -y/--yes • printOutdated implementation (src/print-outdated.js) handles updateMode: previews safeRows, prompts (unless skipConfirmation), creates backup, writes package.json with 2-space indent, logs post-install reminder and summary • Backup‐error path catches and logs failures without corrupting package.json • Vitest update‐mode tests all pass (test/printOutdated.update.test.js, printOutdated.updateBackupError.test.js, printOutdated.updatePromptAbort.test.js) • Full test suite passes (128/128 tests, coverage 92.1%)
traceability.notes: All acceptance criteria for story 011.0-DEV-AUTO-UPDATE are satisfied: the CLI supports the flags, only safe updates are applied, formatting is preserved, preview and confirmation flows work (with --yes override), backups are made (and errors handled), a post-update npm install prompt is emitted, and a summary is returned.
